Class CoverChooser

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class CoverChooser
extends javax.swing.JFileChooser

This class implements methods to choose a cover from the filesystem.

Author:
DSIW

Method Detail

getCoverPath

public java.lang.String getCoverPath()
Returns:
the selected absolute path of the cover. If no cover was selected, then it will return null.
